item.title: How to create Rectangle, Circle and Straigt line using Inkscape
item.description: Create Rectangle, Circle and Straigt line using Inkscape Today we will learn how to create Rectangle, Circle and Straigt line using Inkscape. Inkscape is a great design tool to create SVG images. Using Inkscape you can learn different designs very easily. First you have to open Inkscape and follow below steps: Select File –> New from Template –> Select your required template. Then For straight line, select Draw Baizer curve and Straight lines tool.
